publicwhip.spmotion: S3M-4606 Maureen Watt: Aberdeen City Young Single Persons Housing Project—That the Parliament congratulates Aberdeen City Council on the results of the recent Care Commission report on the council’s Young Single Persons Housing Project, which scored well out of six inspection areas, with two good outcomes and four very good outcomes, and recognises the efforts of the council’s staff in helping and supporting young, vulnerable, homeless people in their time of great need.
